skills.title: Skills
skills.content: My skills are distributed in the development of ecommerce on Shopify, custom web applications in Python / Django, PHP and the creation of custom plugins for Open Source CMS such as Prestashop, Magento 2, Wordpress and others. as well as the layout of corporate sites in HTML, SASS, JS, etc.

experience.title: Work experience
experience.job_grupo_description: Senior developer in charge of the development of ecommerce solutions in Shopify, huge features like entire sites development, complex business rules and also small but nicely features.
experience.job_sigma_description: Fullstack developer specialized in the build of ecommerce in Shopify, Prestashop, Magento 2, and WooCommerce, Development of web applications in Django with different needs in which it stands out: Job board, custom CRMs, bet management, administrative platform for third-party ads, etc.
experience.job_quarto_description: Co-founder of the creative agency Quarto Ãštil, Lead of development department and developer of many websites using Wordpress and custom web applications in PHP.
experience.job_ryt_description: Responsible for the creation and maintenance of the corporate website of the company, developing custom web applications in PHP for the job bank, library of tax documents, and course and student management.
